Text: I have been downloading this since the day you posted it. It has been weeks! I am at 93.4 and to stubborn to abort. It has been stuck in over 90% since the 1st few days. What is it going to take to finish!! I could get it somewhere else by now but what is the point! Everyday I come home from work thinking "this will be the day" and everyday I am disappointed. Ur killing me here. Most of your stuff is good, U are a great user and I like your torrents which is why I downloaded in the 1st place. I have a great connection, a good PC, I usually can get a movie in under a hour is it has goo seeders, but this is just crazy.
Its been a few days since I wrote last 97.8. Give er another week or 2 and I think I may have it!! I haven't lost faith yet!
It finished! It bloody finished!! I will let y'all know how it plays!!

Well worth download as usually. Quality is top notch, unbeatable. DVD plays with no Menu, just starts right up. Has sub titles that can be turned on or off in you dvd player. I am seeding this, so lets get the seeders back up.
